Interface TextureTranscoder

Texture data transcoding strategy.

A Renderer implementation usually has one of these, so that it can create compressed textures from transcoded texture data (eg KTX2) via SceneModel.createTexture.

Hierarchy

  • TextureTranscoder

Implemented by

  • KTX2TextureTranscoder

transcode

  • transcode(buffers: ArrayBuffer[], config?: {}): Promise<CompressedTextureParams>
    • Defined in viewer/src/viewer/textureTranscoders/TextureTranscoder.ts:26

    Transcodes texture data from transcoded buffers.

    Parameters

    • buffers: ArrayBuffer[]

      Transcoded input texture data. Given as an array of buffers so that we can support multi-image textures, such as cube maps.

    • Optional config: {}

      Transcoding options.

    Returns Promise<CompressedTextureParams>

    Transcoded output texture data.
